00015 //
00016 // 
00017 // File:        Echange_EV_Options.h
00018 // Directory:   $TRUST_ROOT/src/Kernel/Math
00019 // Version:     /main/7
00020 // 
00021 //
00022 #ifndef Echange_EV_Options_included
00023 #define Echange_EV_Options_included
00024 
00025 class Echange_EV_Options
00026 {
00027 public:
00028 // SYNC is the default: the owner of the shared value sends the
00029 // value to other processors
00030 // SUM: the owner of a shared value receives values from other processors
00031 // that own the same value (either item_commun or in virtual space)
00032 // and computes the sum. The user might want to SYNCHRONIZE afterwards
00033 // MAX: same as SUM, but the owner computes the max for all processors
00034 // that share the data
00035 // MAXCOL1: only meaningful for arrays with line_size > 1. For each shared "line"
00036 // of the multidimensionnal array, take the processor for which the first value on the line
00037 // is the highest and copy the whole line to the processor that owns the item.
00038   enum Operation { SYNC, SUM, MAX, MINCOL1 };
00039   enum Items_Communs { ITEMS_COMMUNS_YES, ITEMS_COMMUNS_NO };
00040   enum Items_Virtuels { ITEMS_VIRTUELS_YES, ITEMS_VIRTUELS_NO };
00041   Echange_EV_Options(Operation op = SYNC,
00042                      Items_Communs items_communs = ITEMS_COMMUNS_YES,
00043                      Items_Virtuels items_virtuels = ITEMS_VIRTUELS_YES);
00044   Operation get_op() const
00045   {
00046     return op_;
00047   }
00048   Items_Communs get_items_communs() const
00049   {
00050     return items_communs_;
00051   }
00052   Items_Virtuels get_items_virtuels() const
00053   {
00054     return items_virtuels_;
00055   }
00056   int operator==(const Echange_EV_Options& x) const
00057   {
00058     return op_==x.op_ && items_communs_==x.items_communs_ && items_virtuels_==x.items_virtuels_;
00059   }
00060 protected:
00061   Operation op_;
00062 // Flag: process items_communs or not ?
00063   Items_Communs items_communs_;
00064   Items_Virtuels items_virtuels_;
00065 };
00066 
00067 extern const Echange_EV_Options& echange_ev_opt_default;
00068 #endif
00069
